column4: What filesystem should I use for a hard drive I'm storing my documents and music on?
do you use Windows?
did.
nah, no Win32.
why?
I'd say fat32 or ext3.
what speakers do you have/how powerul?
heh, 5.1 200watt. You like Prodigy (I'm listening to Spitfire). :D
is that how powerful te whole system is, or just the sub?
http://www.last.fm/user/wdaltec
not sure actually. I think that's all together. The sub can only rattle so much. :P
the Z-2300s have a 120watt sub and two 40w sats. I got a noise complaint from two doors down last week =D
what were you listening to when you got the noise complaint? :)
''Hold Your Colour' by Pendulum
I've not heard that. I'll have to acquire that.
I'm uploading the track now =D
to where?
yousendit.com Killgore_ Hold Your Colour, the song.
if you have broadband, the album is here http://ts.searching.com/torrent/404577/Pendulum_Hold_Your_Colour
I'll check it out.
http://s11.yousendit.com/d.aspx?id=0BACSIYSZZC7H2CFGMILXKS3A0
awesome. :D I'm listening to it now.
wow this is nice. Thanks. :)
I really suggest the album, then. Killgore_ I really like 'Coburn - We Interrupt This Program'
